mapper.select: select * from (select trim(ctpfco || lpad(ctnrco, 6, '0') || ctckco) as cntrId, lncdco as lncd, ctszco as ctsz, cttyco as ctty, decode(vsdrco, 'I', vscdco || '/' || trim(vsvyco) || '-' || vsdrco, ' ') as imvsvy, decode(vsdrco, 'E', vscdco || '/' || trim(vsvyco) || '-' || vsdrco, ' ') as exvsvy, vscdco as curvscd, vsvyco as curvsvy, vsdrco as curvsdr, intdco as intd, infeco as infe, inogco as inog, inthco as inth, inhzco as inhz, indmco as indm, decode(iydtif, 0, '', to_char(to_date(iydtif || lpad(iytmif, 6, '0'), 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) as inYardDt, decode(oydtif, 0, '', to_char(to_date(oydtif || lpad(oytmif, 6, '0'), 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) as outYardDt, decode(iyopcdif, 'IF', '进口重箱', 'IE', '进口空箱', 'RF', '公路进重箱', 'RE', '公路进空箱', 'LE', '装箱', 'LI', '拆箱') as inPortType, decode(vsdrco, 'I', ptldco, 'E', ptdsco) as port, ceil(decode(oydtif, 0, sysdate, to_date(oydtif || lpad(oytmif, 6, '0'), 'yyyymmddhh24miss')) - to_date(iydtif || lpad(iytmif, 6, '0'), 'yyyymmddhh24miss')) as storageDays, ctgwco as weight, decode(decode(crvsdrif, 'E', inotif), 'Y', 'Y', ' ') as loaded, caagco as caag from tcmscop, tcctifp where ctpfco = #{ctpf} and ctnrco = #{ctnr} and ctckco = #{ctck} and iyidco = iyidif order by iydtif desc, iytmif desc) a where rownum = 1
select ctpfim from custimp where vscdim = #{vscd} and vsvyim = #{vsvy} and vsdrim = #{vsdr} and trim(ctpfim||lpad(ctnrim,6,'0')||ctckim) = #{cntrId} and rownum = 1
select ctpfcc from tcexccp where vscdcc = #{vscd} and vsvycc = #{vsvy} and trim(ctpfcc||lpad(ctnrcc,6,'0')||ctckcc) = #{cntrId} and rownum = 1
select cablmf from tcblmfp where vscdmf = #{vscd} and vsvymf = #{vsvy} and vsdrmf = #{vsdr} and trim(ctpfmf||lpad(ctnrmf,6,'0')||ctckmf) = #{cntrId} and rownum = 1

select trim(vgmmvg) as weighingWayVGM, trim(vgmwvg) as weightVGM,trim(vgmsvg) as signVGM from ctnvgm where vscdvg = #{vscd} and vsvyvg = #{vsvy} and vsdrvg = #{vsdr} and trim(cntrvg) = trim(#{cntrId})
